title: October 2018 Android Security Bulletin Partner Preview

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_pars_browsing_cmd of avrc_pars_tg.cc, there is a possible use-after-free due to improper locking. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege in the Bluetooth service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to copy p_browse_data into the destination buffer to prevent the use-after-free.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the SetupWizard, there is a possible Factory Reset Protection bypass due to a permissions bypass. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to disable changing device lock when the device is not provisioned to prevent the FRP bypass.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sdp_copy_raw_data of sdp_discovery.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution over bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the copy length to avoid an out of bounds write.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ixheaacd_real_synth_fft_p3 of ixheaacd_esbr_fft.c there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to change data sizes, use safer functions, and relocate some function pointers.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In mca_ccb_hdl_req of mca_cact.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In copy_process of fork.c, there is possible memory corruption due to a double free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to reset cpufreq_task_times before error, to ensure all fields are initialized.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the content provider of the download manager, there is a possible SQL injection due to improper input validation. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent SQL injection.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In CollectValuesOrEntriesImpl of elements.cc, there is possible remote code execution due to type confusion. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent the type confusion.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In AMediaCodecCryptoInfo_new of NdkMediaCodec.cpp, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote code execution in external apps with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to check for the overflow condition.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sdcardfs_create and sdcardfs_mkdir of inode.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to hold a lock while changing current->fs.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sdcardfs_open of file.c, there is a possible Use After Free due to an unusual root cause. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the OVERRIDE_CRED macro in favor of more explicit control flow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ipSecSetEncapSocketOwner of XfrmController.cpp, there is a possible failure to initialize a security feature due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local denial of service of IPsec on sockets with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to initialize optlen.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_msg_cback of avrc_api.cc, there is a possible out-of-bound read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add missing AVRCP message length check inside avrc_msg_cback.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In bta_av_proc_meta_cmd of bta_av_act.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to check packet length in bta_av_proc_meta_cmd.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In checkGrantUriPermissionLocked of ActivityManagerService.java, there is a possible permissions bypass. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to perform an appropriate permissions check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In rfc_process_mx_message of rfc_ts_frames.cc, there is a possible out-of-bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure in the Bluetooth service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add length checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In smp_process_keypress_notification of smp_act.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed move access to the status variable after the bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In smp_proc_master_id of smp_act.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add packet length check in smp_proc_master_id.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In smp_proc_enc_info of smp_act.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure over Bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add checks to verify the validity of the packet.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ihevcd_parse_sei_payload of ihevcd_parse_headers.c, there is a possible out-of-bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent the overflow condition.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the Pixel 2 bootloader, there is an elevation of privilege due to a missing permission check. This could lead to a local bypass of carrier restrictions, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to update to a version of the bootloader that is not vulnerable.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In impeg2_fmt_conv_yuv420p_to_yuv420sp_uv_av8 of impeg2_format_conv.s there is a possible out of bounds write due to missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks and fix stride length.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In SkSampler::Fill of SkSampler.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to refactor usage of SkMalloc functionality to prevent the integer overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In getOffsetForHorizontal of Layout.java, there is a possible application hang due to a slow width calculation. This could lead to remote denial of service if a contact with many hidden unicode characters were sent to the device and used by a local app, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to improve the performance of the width calculation.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_ctrl_pars_vendor_rsp of avrc_pars_ct.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution over bluetooth with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In readVector of iCrypto.cpp, there is a possible invalid read due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local information disclosure from the DRM server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add error checks and clear the buffer to prevent uninitialized data.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In rfc_process_mx_message of rfc_ts_frames.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add length checks.
